name: PLEDGE
description:
This is my work that I did in 2018, this is the work that became the blueprint for my latest work, in the process I just started with a question are you really fine? or lying with the situation, is a crossroads where I have to determine which direction to take. Then it developed to the process of my creation to this day.

5400px X 5400px

If you collect or purchase a token of this work you have the right to:
- Publish the work that you collect through your social media account by including the credit of the creator's name and the link to his social media account or the link that is linked to the creator.
- Print this work in physical print format for personal display purposes (not intended to commercialize this asset)
- Presenting this work at a digital exhibition event on a specific platform that accommodates it, while still giving credit to the creator.
- The rest is the right to enjoy it and I am happy if you are willing to write your point of view from my work and you publish and share stories for this work.

Please share good things.
Kind Regards
Wicaksono Azis
